SEARCH
Module edu.upc.subgrupprop113.supermarketmanager
Package edu.upc.subgrupprop113.supermarketmanager.controllers

Class PersistenceController

java.lang.Object
edu.upc.subgrupprop113.supermarketmanager.controllers.PersistenceController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPersistenceController
public class PersistenceController extends Object implements IPersistenceController
Implementation of the IPersistenceController interface for managing supermarket data persistence.

This controller handles the import and export of supermarket data using configurable strategies. By default, it utilizes JSON-based strategies for both import and export.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PersistenceController()
    Constructs a new PersistenceController with default strategies for importing and exporting supermarket data in JSON format.

  • Constructor Details

    • PersistenceController

      public PersistenceController()
      Constructs a new PersistenceController with default strategies for importing and exporting supermarket data in JSON format.

  • Method Details

    • setImportFileStrategy

      public void setImportFileStrategy(ImportFileStrategy importFileStrategy)
      Sets the strategy for importing files into the supermarket system.

      This method allows the selection of a specific import strategy to manage the way data is read and incorporated from files.

      Parameters:
      importFileStrategy - the ImportFileStrategy to be used for importing files.

    • setExportFileStrategy

      public void setExportFileStrategy(ExportFileStrategy exportFileStrategy)
      Sets the strategy for exporting files from the supermarket system.

      This method allows the selection of a specific export strategy to manage the way data is written and saved to files.

      Parameters:
      exportFileStrategy - the ExportFileStrategy to be used for exporting files.

    • importSupermarket

      public SupermarketData importSupermarket(String filePath)
      Imports supermarket data from a file using the configured import strategy.
      Specified by:
      importSupermarket in interface IPersistenceController
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file containing the supermarket data. If the path is null uses the default file path.
      Returns:
      a SupermarketData object containing the imported data.

    • exportSupermarket

      public void exportSupermarket(SupermarketData supermarketData, String filePath)
      Exports supermarket data to a file using the configured export strategy.
      Specified by:
      exportSupermarket in interface IPersistenceController
      Parameters:
      supermarketData - the SupermarketData object containing the data to be exported.
      filePath - the path to the file where the data will be saved. If the path is null uses the default file path.
